endpoints.description: Create a new menu template based on the restaurant's offerings.
Retrieve a detailed view of a specific menu template by its identifier.
Update an existing menu template with the provided changes.
Remove a specific menu template by its identifier.
Create a custom configuration for a dish accounting for user's selected preferences.
Retrieve a list of predefined dietary preferences for user customization.
Analyze a dish's ingredients to identify potential allergens based on user input.
Retrieve the entire menu for a specific restaurant including categorized dishes.
Update the popularity metric of a dish for analytics purposes.
Submit user feedbacks related to the menu browsing and selection experience.
